Author: John Garbutt <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Aug 19 16:11:38 2013 +0100

    xenapi: set vcpu cap to ensure weight is applied
    
    There is a bug in XenServer 6.1 and 6.2 that means the vcpu weight
    we set is ignored if the cap is not also set.
    
    Setting the cap to its default of 0, meaning no cap, to ensure the
    weight value is applied.
    
    Fixes bug 1213960
